column4: my atheros as5050 card doesn't even show in ifconfig but it shows that the atheros driver is being used. What should I do?
Feisty on my Acer says the Atheros card is an unknown device and when I try to use ndiswrapper it says that there isn't any hardware for the driver. What can I do?
my atheros card only required me to sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)
The restricted-manager already tells me the Atheros HAL driver is being used.
